/usr/bin/mpicxx  -O3 -DNDEBUG   CMakeFiles/tomocomd_mpi.dir/parallel_tomocomd.cpp.o CMakeFiles/tomocomd_mpi.dir/src/utils/CParser.cpp.o CMakeFiles/tomocomd_mpi.dir/src/input/reader.cpp.o CMakeFiles/tomocomd_mpi.dir/src/metrics/Metric.cpp.o CMakeFiles/tomocomd_mpi.dir/src/metrics/CanberraMetric.cpp.o CMakeFiles/tomocomd_mpi.dir/src/metrics/MinkowskiMetric.cpp.o  -o tomocomd_mpi -Wl,-rpath,/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/openmpi/lib /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libboost_system.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libboost_filesystem.so /usr/lib/libopenbabel.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/openmpi/lib/libmpi_cxx.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/openmpi/lib/libmpi.so
